channel.title: Item colours + names
channel.description: When i try to edit item names + colours in Items.def then compress them into Items.def.gz all seems to compile well, and server running etc etc. When I log into the game, there is no difference done to the items so im just wondering whats goin on o.O?

item.title: Item colours + names
item.dc:creator: @adu adu
item.description:
@adu wrote:

You will need to change the name and colour through the file “items.dmk” and “animations.dmk” in you client conf folder. If you search the fourms for a ‘Def Packer’, it makes it easy to edit them.

Items.dmk changes the colour of the item when it is in your inventory and also changes your item names

Animations.dmk changes the colour of the item when you are weilding the item (if you can)

Read full topic
